domain.name: TV Shows

entity.name: FOX News Sunday With Chris Wallace
entity.description: Journalist Chris Wallace moderates the Fox News political issues program, featuring interview with newsmakers of the day, focusing on the current topics and issues facing the country. The son of CBS newsman Mike Wallace, Chris Wallace also previously helmed the NBC weekend political show "Meet the Press."

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Meet the Press
entity.description: For almost as long as there has been television, there's been "Meet the Press." The hourlong Sunday morning public affairs program has featured interviews with countless U.S. and world leaders, and has reviewed, analyzed and discussed the news of the week -- all while looking toward the week ahead.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: This Week With George Stephanopoulos
entity.description: Former Clinton White House staffer and current co-anchor of ABC's weekday morning news show "Good Morning America," George Stephanopoulos offers a look at current events with a focus on the politics of the day. Each week's show includes interviews with top newsmakers (including some of the nation's top political leaders) as well as a roundtable discussion, usually featuring journalists from ABC and other news organizations, of the week's happenings. Since 2008, the program has broadcast from a studio at the Newseum in Washington, D.C.
